report.title: Method of Preparing Salvia divinorum Blotter
report.author: The_Stalker
report.bodytext: How to make 'Blotter Salvia' by The_Stalker /n /n This is simply a method of preparation so that you get all the benefit of salvia without need for a bong or tasting horrible smoke. This method is nearly tasteless, and produces a smooth trip. /n /n You need: /n 5 grams Salvia Divinorum dry unextracted /n 100 ml of solvent (more on solvent choice below) /n 900ml water /n Jar or 1 liter flask /n Bowl /n Funnel /n Coffee grinder or Mortar and Pestle /n Filter Paper or Coffee Filter /n Tea strainer or fine mesh sieve /n /n 1. Powder 5grams of dry Salvia Divinorum leaves. A coffee grinder will work if it is the type with a small bowl and a spinning blade. A mortar and pestle is best though. /n 2. In the jar or flask, combine powdered Salvia with solvent. (A note on solvents; any polar solvent will work but for this extraction an alcohol is best, either 151 proof Everclear or 70% Isopropyl Alcohol [rubbing alcohol].) /n 3. Let this mixture sit for 10 hours. /n 4. Add your water to the flask or jar. Adding water to the alcohol lowers the solubility of the active ingredient Salivorin A to the point that it will fall out or ?precipitate?. This will make your 1-liter solution look slightly cloudy; it is the clouds that you want. Let sit for 5 minutes. /n 5. Set up your funnel with filter paper over the bowl. Get your tea strainer above the funnel. /n 6. Pour the solution from the flask, through the strainer and filter into the bowl. Do it slowly, don?t let the liquid get more than half way up the paper. /n 7. Wash out your flask or jar with more water to get any residue on the bottom, again pour it through the filters. /n 8. Discard the liquid and save the paper. You should notice a nice round area on your paper that looks slightly green or yellow. /n 9. Dry your paper in an oven; 2 minutes on 300 degrees work fine. It will now look as though you have crystals on your paper and indeed you do. /n /n Cut this circular green are into five equal pieces, each one is good for a nice oral trip or maybe two smoked. To use simply take one of your strip and place it under the tongue, the effects can be felt in about fifteen minutes. A strip may also be smoked for more immediate effects. /n /n The advantages of this method are that there is no harsh smoke, and no bitter taste.
